SELECT s.id, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.delete_flag, s.update_by, s.update_time, s.source_name, s.type, s.apply_status, s.type, s.url, s.sort, s.v_id, s.user_id, u.username, s2.url AS vUrl,
sp.power_level AS powerLevel,
s.is_pub FROM springboot.source s LEFT JOIN springboot.user u ON s.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN springboot.source s2 ON s.v_id = s2.id
LEFT JOIN springboot.source_power sp ON sp.source_id = s.id
WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.type != '2'
AND sp.create_ids = #{createIds} AND sp.delete_flag = 0
AND s.create_ids = #{createIds}
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND s.type = #{type}
AND (s.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR AND s.source_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR AND s.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
ORDER BY s.sort,s.update_time,s.id DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageNumber}

SELECT count(*) FROM springboot.source s LEFT JOIN springboot.user u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.delete_flag = 0
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND s.type = #{type}
AND (s.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR AND s.source_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR AND s.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))

SELECT s1.id, s1.create_by, s1.create_time, s1.delete_flag, s1.update_by, s1.update_time, s1.source_name, s1.type, s1.url, s1.sort, s1.user_id, s1.desc_content, s1.apply_status, s1.v_id, s1.user_ids, s1.create_ids, s1.update_ids, s2.real_url, s2.url AS vUrl FROM springboot.source s1 LEFT JOIN springboot.source s2 ON s1.v_id = s2.id WHERE s1.delete_flag = 0 AND s1.id = #{id}
